role_description: An Ansible role that installs pyenv on Linux or macOS
role_description_full_overview: [pyenv](https://github.com/pyenv/pyenv) lets you switch between multiple versions of Python. It's simple, unobtrusive, and follows the UNIX tradition of single-purpose tools that do one thing well.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs pyenv on Linux or macOS.
